payloads.defensive_notes:
Education-only (non-executing).
- Enforce consistent responses.
- Use parameterized queries.
- Avoid logic branching on raw user input.
- MySQL/MariaDB: disable verbose errors in production.
- Monitor slow query log and restrict SUPER/FILE privileges.
- Integrate SAST/DAST and code review for query construction.
payloads.description: Concept: response differences reveal true/false evaluation even without visible errors.
payloads.title: Blind SQLi (Boolean-Based) (mysql) - Template

payloads.defensive_notes:
Education-only (non-executing).
- Set DB query time limits.
- Monitor abnormal latency patterns.
- Use parameterization everywhere.
- MySQL/MariaDB: disable verbose errors in production.
- Monitor slow query log and restrict SUPER/FILE privileges.
- Integrate SAST/DAST and code review for query construction.
payloads.description: Concept: response latency may indicate conditional execution.
payloads.title: Blind SQLi (Time-Based) (mysql) - Template

payloads.defensive_notes:
Education-only (non-executing).
- Root cause: dynamic SQL string construction.
- Use parameterized queries / prepared statements.
- Suppress detailed DB errors in production.
- MySQL/MariaDB: disable verbose errors in production.
- Monitor slow query log and restrict SUPER/FILE privileges.
- Integrate SAST/DAST and code review for query construction.
payloads.description: Concept: database error messages may leak query structure when input is concatenated into SQL statements.
payloads.title: Error-Based SQLi (mysql) - Template

payloads.defensive_notes:
Education-only (non-executing).
- Do not rely on regex keyword filtering.
- Use parameterized queries as primary defense.
- MySQL/MariaDB: disable verbose errors in production.
- Monitor slow query log and restrict SUPER/FILE privileges.
- Integrate SAST/DAST and code review for query construction.
payloads.description: Concept: naive keyword filters fail against case changes or token splitting.
payloads.title: Filter Evasion Concepts (Comments / Case) (mysql) - Template

payloads.defensive_notes:
Education-only (non-executing).
- Use parameterized queries.
- Apply least-privilege DB roles.
- Avoid direct string interpolation in SQL.
- MySQL/MariaDB: disable verbose errors in production.
- Monitor slow query log and restrict SUPER/FILE privileges.
- Integrate SAST/DAST and code review for query construction.
payloads.description: Concept: attacker-controlled input may alter SELECT queries to combine additional result sets.
payloads.title: Union-Based SQLi (mysql) - Template
